# Basic Solow Model
$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= BK_t^\alpha L_t^{1-\alpha} \\
r_t &= \alpha B \left(\frac{K_t}{L_t}\right)^{\alpha -1}\\
w_t &= (1-\alpha) \left(\frac{K_t}{L_t}\right)^\alpha \\
S_t &= sY_t \\
K_{t+1}&= sY_t + (1-\delta)K_t \\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t
\end{aligned}
$$
For Shiny MathJax
$$
\\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= BK_t^\\alpha L_t^{1-\\alpha} \\\\
r_t &= \\alpha B \\left(\\frac{K_t}{L_t}\\right)^{\\alpha -1}\\\\
w_t &= (1-\\alpha) \\left(\\frac{K_t}{L_t}\\right)^\\alpha \\\\
S_t &= sY_t \\\\
K_{t+1}&= sY_t + (1-\\delta)K_t \\\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t
\\end{aligned}
$$

# General Solow Model
$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\alpha (A_tL_t)^{1-\alpha} \\
r_t &= \alpha \left(\frac{K_t}{A_tL_t}\right)^{\alpha -1}\\
w_t &= (1-\alpha) \left(\frac{K_t}{A_tL_t}\right)^\alpha A_t\\
S_t &= sY_t \\
K_{t+1}&= sY_t + (1-\delta)K_t \\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\
A_{t+1} &= (1 + g)*A_t
\end{aligned}
$$


For Shiny MathJax
$$
\\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\\alpha (A_tL_t)^{1-\\alpha} \\\\
r_t &= \\alpha \\left(\\frac{K_t}{A_tL_t}\\right)^{\\alpha -1}\\\\
w_t &= (1-\\alpha) \\left(\\frac{K_t}{A_tL_t}\\right)^\\alpha A_t\\\\
S_t &= sY_t \\\\
K_{t+1}&= sY_t + (1-\\delta)K_t \\\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\\\
A_{t+1} &= (1 + g)*A_t
\\end{aligned}
$$

## Extended Solow Small Open Economy

$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= BK_t^\alpha L_t^{1-\alpha} \\
Y_n &= Y_t + \bar{r}F_t \\
V_t &= K_t + F_t\\
r_t &= \alpha B \left(\frac{K_t}{L_t}\right)^{\alpha -1}\\
w_t &= (1-\alpha) B \left(\frac{K_t}{L_t}\right)^\alpha \\
S_t &= sY_t \\
S_t &= V_{t+1} - V_t\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\
\end{aligned}
$$

For Shiny MathJax:

$$
\\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= BK_t^\\alpha L_t^{1-\\alpha} \\\\
Y_n &= Y_t + \\bar{r}F_t \\\\
V_t &= K_t + F_t\\\\
r_t &= \\alpha B \\left(\\frac{K_t}{L_t}\\right)^{\\alpha -1}\\\\
w_t &= (1-\\alpha) B \\left(\\frac{K_t}{L_t}\\right)^\\alpha \\\\
S_t &= sY_t \\\\
S_t &= V_{t+1} - V_t\\\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\\\
\\end{aligned}
$$

## Extended Solow Human Capital
$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\alpha * H_t^\phi * (A_t * L_t)^{(1- \alpha - \phi)} \\
K_{t+1} &= s_KY_t + (1-\delta)K_{t} \\
H_{t+1} &= s_HY_t + (1-\delta)H_{t} \\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\
A_{t+1}&=(1+n)A_t \\
\end{aligned}
$$


For Shiny MathJax:
$$
\\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\\alpha * H_t^\\phi * (A_t * L_t)^{(1- \\alpha - \\phi)} \\\\
K_{t+1} &= s_KY_t + (1-\\delta)K_{t} \\\\
H_{t+1} &= s_HY_t + (1-\\delta)H_{t} \\\\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\\\
A_{t+1}&=(1+n)A_t \\\\
\\end{aligned}
$$

## Extended Solow Model with Land
$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\alpha  * (A_t * L_t)^{(1- \beta)} * X_t^\kappa: \alpha + \beta + \kappa = 1 \\
K_{t+1} &= s_KY_t + (1-\delta)K_{t} \\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\
A_{t+1}&=(1+n)A_t \\
\end{aligned}
$$

## Extended Solow Model with Oil
$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\alpha  * (A_t * L_t)^{(1- \beta)} * E_t^\varepsilon: \alpha + \beta + \varepsilon = 1 \\
E_t &= s_ER_t\\
R_t &= R_{t-1} - E_{t-1}\\
K_{t+1} &= s_KY_t + (1-\delta)K_{t} \\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\
A_{t+1}&=(1+n)A_t \\
\end{aligned}
$$

## Extended Solow Model with Oil and Land
$$
\begin{aligned}
Y_t &= K_t^\alpha  * (A_t * L_t)^{(1- \beta)} * X^\kappa * E_t^\varepsilon : \alpha + \beta + \varepsilon + \kappa= 1 \\
E_t &= s_ER_t\\
R_t &= R_{t-1} - E_{t-1}\\
K_{t+1} &= s_KY_t + (1-\delta)K_{t} \\
L_{t+1}&=(1+n)L_t \\
A_{t+1}&=(1+n)A_t \\
\end{aligned}
$$
